__e: "'Thank God for giving George the courage and strength to be such a hero.

But the truth is, I wouldn't be standing here, if it wasn't for the courage and support of each and every one of you.
I'm not sure if I'd have the bottle to do what you're doing.
I just hope you've got the guts to do what you know is right, like I'm doing.

I ask you, Jesus, every day... for enough power and strength for the day, courage for the next day,

- that can handle problems and make something meaningful out of life. - Or, you have the choice to have the courage, to see and deal, - with the world for what it really is:
